医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
CN Bio与Primetech Corporation签署战略合作伙伴关系，建立OOC解决方案在日本的分销渠道CN Bio 是加速药物发现和开发工作流程的片上器官 (OOC) 系统和解决方案的领先供应商，今天宣布已与日本生命科学研究设备分销商 Primetech 建立战略合作伙伴关系。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250115/CN-Bio-signs-strategic-partnership-with-Primetech-Corporation-to-built-distribution-channel-for-OOC-solutions-in-Japan。 ASPX https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250115/CN-Bio-signs-strategic-partnership-with-Primetech-Corporation-to-built-distribution-channel-for-OOC-solutions-in-Japan。 aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0f0c23dc-0feb-450d-8907-7b7446b10c59 Wed, 15 Jan 2025 07:25:00 -0500 CN Bio signs strategic partnership with Primetech Corporation to establish distribution channel for OOC solutions in Japan
与 SARS-CoV-2 感染易感性增加相关的遗传风险因素研究人员发现了 SARS-CoV-2 感染的一种新的遗传风险因素，为了解该病毒侵入人类细胞的能力提供了新的见解。 SARS-CoV-2 是传播 COVID-19 的病毒。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250115/Genetic-risk-factor-linked-to-increased-susceptibility-to-SARS-CoV-2-infection.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250115/Genetic-risk-factor-linked-to-increased-susceptibility-to-SARS-CoV-2-infection.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=715e71fd-944b-48bd-8c29-ba03f5e9a337 Wed, 15 Jan 2025 07:20:36 -0500 Genetic risk factor linked to increased susceptibility to SARS-CoV-2 infection
Pheno Therapeutics 获得领先的多发性硬化症治疗候选药物 PTD802 的临床试验授权Pheno Therapeutics Limited 是一家专注于发现和开发用于治疗神经系统疾病的小分子疗法的生物技术公司，今天宣布其已获得英国 MHRA（药品和保健品监管机构）的临床试验授权 (CTA)。主要候选人，PTD802。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250115/Pheno-Therapeutics-granted-clinical-trial-authorization-for-lead-multiple-sclerosis-therapeutic-candidate-PTD802.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250115/Pheno-Therapeutics-granted-clinical-trial-authorization-for-lead-multiple-sclerosis-therapeutic-candidate-PTD802.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=974090fb-6298-4059-9f43-5fa2889544aa Wed, 15 Jan 2025 07:18:00 -0500 Pheno Therapeutics granted clinical trial authorization for lead multiple sclerosis therapeutic candidate PTD802
Enhanc3D Genomics 推出 3D 多组学解决方案套件以加速药物开发3D 基因组学技术的创新者 Enhanc3D Genomics（“Enhanced”）今天宣布推出一套集成的多组学解决方案，以加速和提高药物发现的精确度。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250115/Enhanc3D-Genomics-launches-suite-of-3D-multi-omics-solutions-to-accelerate-drug-development.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250115/Enhanc3D-Genomics-launches-suite-of-3D-multi-omics-solutions-to-accelerate-drug-development.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d3485b64-588c-477f-8b7b-a969d424d7c2 Wed, 15 Jan 2025 07:11:00 -0500 Enhanc3D Genomics launches suite of 3D multi-omics solutions to accelerate drug development
IVF 和 ICSI 妊娠显示出更高的致畸药物暴露率澳大利亚的一项新研究揭示了与自然受孕相比，通过辅助生殖技术（ART）实现的一些怀孕可能导致出生缺陷的潜在原因。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250115/IVF-and-ICSI-pregnancies-show-higher-exposure-to-teratogenic-medicines.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250115/IVF-and-ICSI-pregnancies-show-higher-exposure-to-teratogenic-medicines.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=430c2a93-40ae-4474-b0c0-4a3cecee89e1 Wed, 15 Jan 2025 07:10:19 -0500 IVF and ICSI pregnancies show higher exposure to teratogenic medicines
GroceryDB 帮助购物者发现超加工食品这个开源数据库利用机器学习来评估食品加工，促进营养安全并让消费者在杂货市场做出明智的选择。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250115/GroceryDB-helps-shoppers-spot-ultra-processed-foods.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250115/GroceryDB-helps-shoppers-spot-ultra-processed-foods.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=98286f14-ed38-42f9-bd41-0d652eab3bd4 Wed, 15 Jan 2025 07:04:00 -0500 GroceryDB helps shoppers spot ultra-processed foods
Terumo Blood and Cell Technologies 与 FUJIFILM Irvine Scientific 合作，为细胞疗法开发商加速 T 细胞扩增Terumo Blood and Cell Technologies (Terumo BCT) 和 FUJIFILM Irvine Scientific 宣布开展战略合作，在 Terumo BCT 的 Quantum Flex™ 细胞扩增系统上使用 Fujifilm 的 PRIME-XV® T 细胞扩增介质来帮助加速 T 细胞扩增。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250115/Terumo-Blood-and-Cell-Technologies-and-FUJIFILM-Irvine-Scientific-collaborate-to-accelerate-T-cell-expansion-for-cell-治疗开发者.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250115/Terumo-Blood-and-Cell-Technologies-and-FUJIFILM-Irvine-Scientific-collaborate-to-accelerate-T-cell-expansion-for-cell-疗法-developers.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=eb602287-bca3-4b32-a992-ef533a2388fc Wed, 15 Jan 2025 07:02:00 -0500 Terumo Blood and Cell Technologies and FUJIFILM Irvine Scientific collaborate to accelerate T cell expansion for cell therapy developers
研究揭示胆汁酸如何影响肝癌的免疫治疗免疫疗法是一种现代的癌症治疗方法，利用患者自身的免疫系统来帮助对抗肿瘤。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250115/Study-reveals-how-bile-acids-impact-immunotherapy-in-liver-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250115/Study-reveals-how-bile-acids-impact-immunotherapy-in-liver-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d44faada-3786-428c-95b0-21e2c1d502e8 Wed, 15 Jan 2025 06:37:12 -0500 Study reveals how bile acids impact immunotherapy in liver cancer
CAR-NK 细胞为淋巴瘤提供更安全、更容易的治疗一种新型的基于细胞的免疫疗法为 B 细胞淋巴瘤带来了希望，并且由于制造方面的创新，可以使未来的细胞免疫疗法更便宜且更容易为患者所接受。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250115/CAR-NK-cells-offer-safer-more-accessible-treatment-for-lymphoma.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250115/CAR-NK-cells-offer-safer-more-accessible-treatment-for-lymphoma.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f84a3657-1163-45f9-af58-4535b3a1f2ee Wed, 15 Jan 2025 06:21:25 -0500 CAR-NK cells offer safer, more accessible treatment for lymphoma
超灵敏 ctDNA 检测可改善早期肺癌的风险预测NeXT Personal 的超灵敏 ctDNA 检测对早期肺腺癌的敏感性为 81%，提高了预后准确性和治疗指导。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250115/Ultrasensitive-ctDNA-detection-improves-risk-prediction-in-early-stage-lung-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250115/Ultrasensitive-ctDNA-detection-improves-risk-prediction-in-early-stage-lung-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cc992c53-2b38-465f-ad12-ce59b6916369 Wed, 15 Jan 2025 06:19:00 -0500 Ultrasensitive ctDNA detection improves risk prediction in early-stage lung cancer
